description:
A new damned soul appears to make Hozuki`s day slightly more difficult than before. What he doesn`t expect is what she brings with her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Trashy Battle / The 36 Views of Hell
Un ignoble combat - Les 36 plus beaux panoramas des Enfers
えげつなき戦い / 地獄三十六景
